```tsx
import { UserList } from "@fold-ui/core";
```

### Usage

export const Usage = () => (<UserList users={[
        {
            name: 'Brent Fortuin',
            description: 'brent@fold-ui.com',
            image: '/men/01.jpg',
            tools: <Button size="sm">Message</Button>,
        },
        {
            name: 'Margaret Morris',
            description: 'margaret@fold-ui.com',
            image: '/women/01.jpg',
            tools: <Button size="sm">Message</Button>,
        },
        {
            name: 'Kevin Manuel',
            description: 'kevin@fold-ui.com',
            image: '/men/02.jpg',
            tools: <Button size="sm">Message</Button>,
        },
    ]}/>);

<div className="story-block">
<Usage />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="BasicUsage.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Usage = () => (
    <UserList
        users={[
            {
                name: 'Brent Fortuin',
                description: 'brent@fold-ui.com',
                image: '/men/01.jpg',
                tools: <Button size="sm">Message</Button>,
            },
            {
                name: 'Margaret Morris',
                description: 'margaret@fold-ui.com',
                image: '/women/01.jpg',
                tools: <Button size="sm">Message</Button>,
            },
            {
                name: 'Kevin Manuel',
                description: 'kevin@fold-ui.com',
                image: '/men/02.jpg',
                tools: <Button size="sm">Message</Button>,
            },
        ]}
    />
)
```

export default ({ children }) => <ComponentLayout docs={docs} props={props} css={css}>{children}</ComponentLayout>
